channel.title: [PI]Sheep Sheering Help will rep++
channel.description:
ok i adde sheep shearig. just a basic.... if (hasitem shears............. add item whool.....
But I would like to make it so the sheep turn bald after you shear them and then back to furry again after 30 seconds please help me will Rep++

item.title: [PI]Sheep Sheering Help will rep++

item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“owner nitro, post:1, topic:394680”]ok i adde sheep shearig.
just a basic…
if (hasitem shears…
add item whool…

But I would like to make it so the sheep turn bald after you shear them and then back to furry again after 30 seconds
please help me will Rep++[/quote]

Pretty sure you could either change the Npc id (if possible?), or remove the npc, add one that is bald, then after 30 seconds, add the original to wherever the new one is.
